vega.hipe.gui.xmlutils

Interface XmlDataInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractXmlMapContext, Fecs, HtmlDocument, ObservationPor, Por, SuperPor, XmlData

    public interface XmlDataInterface
    Interface to be implemented by classes that contains XML data
